pages.text: $(li)The Magma Cream is an item that can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/fire_resistance)Potion of Fire Resistance$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l)$(/l).$(br)$(li)This item can be crafted placing a Blaze Powder and a Slimeball in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).

$(li)It can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/magma_block)Magma Block$(/l), $(l:patchouli:redstone/supplementaries/magma_cream_block)Magma Cream Block$(/l), or a $(l:patchouli:redstone/quark/redstone_inductor)Redstone Inductor$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be rarely found in $(l:patchouli:perks/loot_chest)Loot Chests$(/l) in the $(l:patchouli:structures/bastion_remnant)Bastion Remnant$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/magma_cube)Magma Cubes$(/l) may drop this item upon death.
